text: Arturo Merino Benitez International Airport or also called as Santiago- Pudahuel Airport is an airport located in Santiago, Chile, is Chile's largest aviation facility. Its IATA code is SCL and ICAO code is SCEL. The building is the hub for various Chilean airline companies, such as Chile's largest national and international airlines, which has been the subject of a drug trafficking investigation by chilean police. Airlines which serve Comodoro Arturo Merino Benitez International Airport include: *Aerolineas Argentinas *Aeromexico *Air France *American Airlines *Copa *Cubana De Aviacion *Delta Airlines *Lacsa *Iberia *Lan Chile *Ladeco *Lloyd Aereo Boliviano *Martinair *Pluna *Swiss *TAME *United Airlines *Varig == Other websites == * Official website Category:Airports in South America Category:Buildings and structures in Santiago, Chile
